summary: Helpers for packaging rendered audio into common formats.

top_level_symbols.name: _require_pydub
top_level_symbols.doc: Return :class:`~pydub.AudioSegment` or raise a helpful error.

top_level_symbols.name: _write_ffmetadata_chapters
top_level_symbols.doc:
Write an ``FFMETADATA1`` file with chapter entries. Args:
    chapters: Sequence of ``(start_s, end_s, title)`` tuples.

top_level_symbols.name: _mux_m4b_with_chapters
top_level_symbols.doc:
Mux ``input_m4a`` with chapter metadata into ``out_m4b``. Args:
    input_m4a: Source M4A file.

top_level_symbols.name: format_ts
top_level_symbols.doc:
Return a zero-padded ``HH:MM:SS.mmm`` timestamp. Args:
    seconds: Time in seconds.

top_level_symbols.name: export_mp3
top_level_symbols.doc:
Export ``in_wav`` as an MP3 with basic ID3 tags. Args:
    in_wav: Source WAV file.

top_level_symbols.name: export_opus
top_level_symbols.doc:
Export ``in_wav`` as an Opus file with basic tags. Args:
    in_wav: Source WAV file.

top_level_symbols.name: make_chaptered_m4b
top_level_symbols.doc:
Concatenate ``chapter_wavs`` into a single M4B-style file. Args:
    chapter_wavs: Ordered list of chapter WAV files.

top_level_symbols.name: write_chapter_cue
top_level_symbols.doc:
Write a cue sheet with basic chapter information. Args:
    chapter_wavs: Ordered list of chapter WAV files.
